Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy is issued by Kuaru Studios LLC (“Company”, “we”, or “our”) and applies to the use of our websites and services, including but not limited to our official site and any future platforms (collectively referred to as “this Website”).

We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with applicable data protection laws and this Privacy Policy. We collect, process, and use your personal data to provide and improve our services, and ensure your rights are respected and protected.

If you do not agree to all or part of this Privacy Policy, please discontinue your use of this Website and its services.

1. Scope of This Policy

This Privacy Policy applies solely to the Site operated by Kuaru Studios LLC. It does not extend to any third-party platforms, services, or websites that may be linked from our Site. These third-party services are governed by their own privacy policies, which we do not control or assume responsibility for.

2. Information We Collect

We may collect and store the following personal information when you interact with our services:

  • Identifiable Information: such as name, email address, shipping address, phone number
  • Transactional Information: including order details and payment preferences (processed by third-party payment processors)
  • Communication Records: such as emails or contact form submissions
  • Automatically Collected Information: such as IP address, browser type, usage behavior via cookies (see section 5)

We do not collect sensitive personal data (e.g., biometric or financial account details) directly.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use your personal information to:

  • Fulfill and ship your orders
  • Provide customer support
  • Respond to your inquiries
  • Comply with legal requirements
  • Analyze customer data to improve product selection, identify trends, and enhance user experience

We do not sell your data. Your information may be shared only with trusted service providers (e.g., logistics or payment platforms) for purposes strictly necessary to perform our services.

4. Data Retention

Your information will be retained only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Typically:

  • Order-related data: retained for up to 7 years (for accounting and legal compliance)
  • Contact or inquiry data: retained for up to 1 year
  • Cookies: retention varies by type (see section 5)

5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance site functionality, remember your preferences, and analyze usage patterns. You can disable cookies via your browser settings, but doing so may affect the usability of some features.

6. Protection of Personal Information

We implement reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, as with all online activity, absolute security cannot be guaranteed.

7. Children's Privacy

Our services are not directed toward children under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us. We will promptly delete the information from our records.

8. Your Rights

Depending on your region, you may have the right to:

  • Access the data we hold about you
  • Request correction or deletion of your personal data
  • Object to or restrict processing
  • Withdraw consent at any time (where applicable)

To exercise your rights, contact us at hello@kuarustudios.com

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes via the Site or through email, where applicable. Continued use of the Site after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, you may reach us at:

Kuaru Studios LLC

Email: hello@kuarustudios.com

Website: https://kuarustudios.com

By accessing or using this Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to any part of these Terms, please do not use this Website.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By using this Website, you confirm that you accept these Terms and agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations. If you disagree with any part of these Terms, you must discontinue using this Website immediately.

5. External Links

6. Changes to Terms

Kuaru Studios LLC may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

7. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
